lines.text: We ride together, we die together. Bad boys for life.

[pointing a flashlight at Marcus' eyes]
What are you on? Look at your pupils.
Look at my pupils? How the hell am I gonna look at my pupils?
[tries to cross his eyes]
My ass stills hurts from what you did to it the other night.
Hey, it got rough. We got caught up in the moment, shit got crazy. You know how I get.
When you popped me from behind I think you damaged some nerves.
01 I'm in the car, locked, loaded and hunting your motherfucking ass down.
And I'ma be with him.
[pulls gun]
You know what it gonna be if I'm there, gonna be Chitty Chitty Bang Bang nigga.
You a virgin?
Yes, sir.
Good. Keep it that way. Ain't gonna be no fucking tonight.
You ever made love to a man?
No.
You want to?

[on seeing a rat]
Oh, shit. These ain't normal rats.
What my partner means is that these are a special breed called, umm...
Big motherfuckers.
[Repeated Line]
Woosah...

[Screaming at store manager]
You got porno and homo shows up in here in front of my babies? What kind of freak-ass store is this?

[to Mike and Marcus as they walk by]
Hmm, and you two muthafuckas need Jesus.

I can't believe you guys. Do you get up in the morning, call each other up - "Good morning, Marcus." "Good morning, Mike." "How you doin'?" "Ai'ight." "So, how are we going to fuck up the captain's life today?" "Gee, I don't know, I don't know... Ooh, look! Over there. Let's kill three fat people and leave them on the street?"
They were dead before we ran over them.

It doesn't matter if they were dead or not, goddamn it! Every time you leave a corpse on the street, I have to get these detective guys to come in and see what happened. See? They're detecting shit. Then I've gotta get these forensic coroner guys to stick 'em back in the fucking bag! Jesus Christ!

[pretending to be drunk]
Nigga, who is it at the door?
It's Reggie!
Who the fuck is Reggie?
Came to take Megan out.

[to Reggie]
What you want, nigga?
I'm here... to take his daughter out.
Motherfucker, I heard the boy say your name Reggie? You wanna be takin' Megan out?
Yes, sire?
How old is you?
Fifteen.
Shit, nigga. You at least thirty.
[to his sister, a Miami DEA agent]
That was reckless, that was stupid, and that was dangerous.
[pauses]
I'm telling Mommy.

Now *that's* how you supposed to shoot! From now on, that's how you shoot! Oh man, I want my next partner to shoot like that. WOOOOO... it takes a dysfunctional motherfucker to bust somebody in the head like that. That's some dysfunctional shit! My next partner's gonna invite me to his barbeques and shit, though.
We've got our rights.
Why don't you exercise your right to shut the fuck up?
WHITE POWER!
WHITE POWER!
[Two of the guys in hoods whip them off, revealing Mike and Marcus, pointing guns at the Klan]
Blue power, motherfuckers! Miami PD!
Aw, damn! It's the niggras!
You know, Dan Marino should definitely buy this car. Well, not this one, 'cause I'm gonna fuck this one up. But he should definitely get one just like it.
I've got a Police Commissioner so far up my ass, if he spits it's coming out of my mouth.
Mike! There's a papa rat humping the shit out of this mama rat. No, he's straight pile-driving her!
Now how is that information gonna help me do my job?
They fuck just like us!

[opens his front door]
Who the FUCK are you?
I'm Reggie, Mr. Burnett
How old are you?
I'm fifteen, Mr. Burnett
Motherfucker, you look thirty.
[staring into the captain's fishbowl after ingesting X]
This is a nice fish. Big fuckin' eyes, but a nice fuckin' fish.
Mike, the man has a gun to my head!
I bet he'll put it down if I put a hollow point in his eye, now won't he?
Your partner's a cocky nigger!
Oh damn, now was that necessary, sir? Why can't he just be a cop? He got to be a nigga too?
It ain't exactly a pool, man. It's like a big-ass puddle wrapped in blue plastic.
22 cars and a boat, totalled? How did hell you sink a boat?

[about Mike]
Motherfucker shot me in the ass, man.
Who shot you in the ass?
Who? That "who" would be you.
Me? I shot you? I mean, I was shooting. I did at lot of shooting. But I'm not saying I shot you in the ass... but I'm not saying I didn't shoot you...
[looks]
But damn! Somebody shot you in the ass!
Tell me about it.
You see that?
They throwin' cars! How'd I not see that?
Hey, Mike, I'm just trying to be helpful.
Hey, you'd know what would be fuckin' helpful, Marcus? Just shut the fuck up and let me drive, let's try that!
I think we just broke the record for the number of gun fights in one week.
Change the station. More music, less Marcus. If you open the door, he'll be a black Dr. Phil for the next 40 minutes.
[to Mike]
You're like a pitbull with that pink thing hanging out.
[Mike's way of saying I'm sorry]
It's a donut. It's a medical thing. I got it from a maternity store. You know, a lot of pregnant women use it. They can put one cheek here and take the pressure off the other. For you, dawg.
Thoughtful.
Mike, I can't even get an erection. I tried taking Viagra. Popped one, popped two. I've been eating them like Skittles.

Okay, look, we're a partnership, but we're a partnership with boundaries. We got a new rule. From now on, you can't say the word "flaccid" to me. This is our little "boundary box." We're gonna take the word "flaccid" and put it in there with my mom's titties, and your erection problem, and we gonna close this box and we gonna throw this bitch in the ocean. And the only way that you can get to this box is you gotta be motherfuckin' Jacques Cousteau.
Who that? Who in MY HOUSE?
I'm the Devil! Who's asking?
The Devil... is not welcome... HEEEEEERRE!

[a car flies over, nearly colliding with Mike's Ferrari]
WHOOOOO, THAT one puckered up my butt-hole!

[driving with Mike down a hill, through cocaine-processing shacks, in a stolen Humvee]
Is this still plan B?
Naw, this is definitely plan C!
[while driving across Tapia's estate in a stolen Humvee, being shot at by the Cuban Army]
Man, Plan B does not have that big-ass gun in it!
You call this Plan B? What does Plan B stand for? Bullshit!
Look, do you want to drive?
Yeah, pull over by those motherfuckers with the MACHINE GUN!

[on hearing the repair bill for his Ferrari]
TWENTY-ONE THOUSAND? Oh, kiss my black ass...!
You guys are like a couple of blood sucking ticks, draining the life's blood out of this department... Woosaa!
Damn the woosaa captain, did you just call me a tick?

[motioning to Mike]
I was referring to him.

[while ingested with ecstasy, Marcus is wearing Captain Howard's robe walking downstairs talking on the phone]
I love it when you call me bunny lobe.
SHIT!
Yeah girl, you should see this sexy shit I got on.
Who the hell are you talking to?
Vargas and Rub... Reyes. They said they down for whatever.

[referring to the loose swimming pool ladder]
Get my screwdriver! Damn bolts.
Don't mind him. He's just upset because he was injured.
Is he okay?
His wound is fine. It's, um... *other things* that were affected.
Oh... oh!
Theresa!
What?

[to Syd]
It's just nerve damage.
[to Theresa]
You not gonna spoil this... I'll talk to you about it.
All right, everybody start shooting at somebody! Shoot! Shoot!
[everyone does, then]
Shit, I'm out!

[checks his pistol]
I got two rounds left.

[checks his pistol]
One in the chamber.

[checks her pistol]
I'm out.
All these guns in here, and don't none of y'all got no bullets?
I got one, in my hip!
Oh God, he's hit!
[after Marcus vomits in the morgue]
Come here!
I'm... I'm back in the game.

[searching a corpse's cavity]
Think I got something... feels like a bag.
[pulls it out]
Shit, naw, it's his kidney.
[Marcus runs back to the sink and retches again]

[in a stand off]
A bullet in the head will really mess up your extensions!
See, that's that new spiritual shit my partner's on. Me? I actually prefer shooting motherfuckers.
Hey, isn't it low tide?
Yes, I think it is.
Don't you have some relatives that you need to go pick up?
You went too far on that one.

[Watches his house get blown up]
Oh, my God! No! God! Oh, my God!
[after Mike and Marcus's latest massive gunfight/car chase]

[trying to stay calm]
So, you got the drugs.
[they shake their heads]
No drugs. Oh, okay. What about the money?
[they shake theirs heads]
No money. Well then, who's this x-man?
Captain, I was at a family barbecue...
We don't know, but we are going to find out.

[points to the TV news]
Well then, all that... was for nothing?
Oh, we didn't do *all* of that.
[while fleeing Tapia and the Cuban Army in a stolen Humvee, armed with almost-empty guns]
Hey, Marcus, you know how when we usually get in these situations, you know I'm always trying to make you feel better, like we're gonna be all right, like we're gonna make it?
Yeah, yeah...
I could say it, but... it'd be a bunch of bullshit today.
You got three seconds to put your gun down, sir.
He has emotional anger issue problems!
One...
He goes to bed early for this shit! Just to wake up to pop one in a motherfucker!
Two...
Mike, no...!
[a Klansman behind Mike grabs a shotgun]
GUN!
[Mike spins and shoots the Klansmen, then shoots Casper between the eyes as Marcus ducks. Far away, the TNT team hears the gunfire]
Rock and roll, let's go!
Kill them cops!
[gunfight begins]
Just 'cause you got that gun to my partner's head, you're thinking I ain't gonna splatter your shit all over this swamp, huh?
That's what I'm thinking!
See, what you don't understand is my partner came here tonight prepared to die.
He... Hell, no!
[Alexei's partner is cut into pieces by Tapia's gang and brought to him in a tortilla bin]
With all due respect, Mr. Tapia. In my country, I see such things all the time.
I'm sorry for your country.
It's got to be some Cuban stupid tradition to put him in a tortilla bin, huh?
Now, listen to me, you Russian punk. I, me, Johnny Tapia, will sever your head off.
You kill me, and you'll have a shit storm.
Look, I'm down with your spiritual enlightenment and all that, but I need to know right now some crackhead come rollin' up behind me with a nine you gonna cook that fool.
Of course, shoot him in the leg.
Forget that leg shit, man.
Everybody deserves a little dignity.
What about my dignity? Your crackhead gonna be missin' a kneecap, I'm gonna be in a body bag.
Look, Captain, these were not normal corpses.
If I threw you out of moving truck and then ran over your head, you wouldn't be normal either!
CHRIST! Fuck!

[soothingly]
Captain! Remember your pressure points...

[after a car nearly kills Mike and Marcus during the MacArthur causeway chase]
Woooooooo!
That motherfucker flipped!
That one puckered up my butthole.
Almost fuckin' crushed my head.

[after Mike has killed yet another lead, this time throwing him under a train]
We lost the coffin and you barbequed our lead, Mike. This has got to be the worst, most emotional cop week of my life.
Shit just got real.

[singing]
Bad boys, bad boys what ya gonna do? What ya gonna do when we come for you?
[Marcus starts ad-libbing the first verse]
Dude, you gotta learn the words.
We usually only do the chorus.
I've got so much brass up my ass that I can play the Star Spangled Banner.
Listen, we're thinking about ordering a little bit of lunch.
Should we put you down for a bucket of extra crispy, and a couple of grape sodas?

[mimics]
'A couple of grape sodas.'
[Repeated Line]
I've got my rights.
The Russian Grim Reaper is here.
[repeated line]
That's that bullshit.
Crash the ambulance into the mortuary now.

[over radio]
No way. I'm not getting suspended again.
I'm gonna whoop your asses if you don't crash that ambulance into the mortuary now.
Captain, is it possible we can discuss potential reimbursement...
The department doesn't cover personal property, that's why we drive police cars.

[during a gun fight]
Sir, we just want to talk.
You want to talk? All right, go ahead, go ahead.
We're not immigration!
[more gunfire]
They can't hear you, 'cause they're still shooting at you!
[after Mike's flashback about his therapy]
Mike, you go to therapy to get your issues worked out, not bang your therapist.
Now you just talking nasty.
Look, Mike. Calm down!
Calm down? I'm calm! I'm calm... Whoaa! Whoa! I am way too unstable for that bullshit! Stop all the goddamn movement! Everybody stop moving!
[to Syd]
I bet you meet a lot of cute guys. Just like "Sex and the City".
Theresa, cancel the damn cable!
To the DEA you're nothing but a honeypot.
What did you say?
It's no wonder you got the job because you look good in a bathing suit.
Police! Pull over! Stop the car!
Not your badge, man! He has a gun, shoot him!
[after decimating the gang with gunfire]
Now show 'em your badge!
Rodney, I hear there's a boat on fire off the coast of Cuba.
Don't you think we oughta break international waters to help them out?
That's my DAWG.
[after Mike lifts the sheet covering the dead bimbo in the morgue]
Mike!
What?
Show some dignity!
I ain't doin' nothin'.
Cover her titties up!
What-what-what am I gonna do with these, these big-ass dead titties?
But you're *lookin'* at them.
There is something seriously wrong with your brain, man.
Just cover up her titties.
[Mike walks into the room, wearing a new purple suit]
Are you a model or a cop?
Hey, man, I like lookin' good, that's all.
For who?
Hey man, don't hate the playa, hate the game.
Hate the tailor.
We got a tip that the Zopehounders were gonna do a hit on cash or drugs from this big time X-man.
That's what they call an ecstasy dealer on the streets.
Marcus, I know what they call them. That's why I'm Captain.
[Marcus interrogates a dead gang member]
Hey look, man, can you tell me who was driving the black Suburban? Huh? Oh he don't know nothin'. His brains is under the end table.
[turns around to see another dead gang member]
He can't tell us shit, Mike. He's all fucked up.
What's your point?
My point is that dead suspects can't say shit.
[Snell and his team, and the TNT squad, want to go to Cuba with Mike and Marcus]
We don't know you, but you look like you're about to do something stupid. I'm in.
He tell you how fuckin' crazy us former Delta guys are?
[Mike accidentally shot Marcus in the ass]
Yo Mike, why don't you just give it a little kiss? You know, make it feel better?
Hey, just pretend we're not even here.
Say, isn't Ricky Martin having a concert? Get the fuck on!
You always gotta go racial, man.
It's sad, man.
[Johnny has just shot his cousin Roberto - upon hearing the shot, Mama rushes out to the balcony overlooking the courtyard]
What happened to Roberto?
He just killed himself, Mama.
Ai!
Yes, very sad.
You write his mother a nice letter.
[Johnny holds up his hands, one of which is still holding the gun he shot Roberto with]
I'll do it.
It's not good, boss.
[Johnny looks in the storeroom and sees rats nesting in stacks of his cash, and eating through it]
Oh, my God...
[cocks his pistol and shoots at several rats]
Fucking ratones, eating my fucking money!
[sighs]
Carlos, this is a stupid fucking problem to have. But, it is a problem nonetheless.

[to Tapia, who has him at gunpoint]
Look, why don't we all go home... well we'll go home, you go to a hotel, and we'll work this shit out another day cause none of us is really having a good day right now.
[during the car chase/gunfight with the Haitian gang, a stray shot smashes the headlight of Mike's Ferrari]
Ah, shit, shit! Hey, definitely shoot that motherfucker that just... aw, man, my headlight!
Vargas, abort, abort! We're not gonna make it to the tunnel! Go to Plan B! We're going to Plan B!
What Plan B?

[pause]
You don't pay attention to SHIT! That's your problem...!
[they start arguing in the middle of the gunfight]
Are you fucking shitting me? LET'S GO!

[to Marcus]
Follow me, FOLLOW ME!

[in the escape tunnel]
Plan B? What the hell is Plan B?
[as Marcus starts to examine a dead body, the top of its head falls off and hits the ground. Marcus retches, stumbles to a sink, and spits up]
That's that bullshit, that I be talking about.
Mike, the motherfuckin' head fell off!
